data.title: Surname Research
data.text:
Following is a list of surnames being researched in McDowell County, West Virginia, along with the names and email addresses of persons researching the same. If you would like to exchange information with persons researching your lines, click on the person's name to send an email.

If you would like to be listed here SEND AN EMAIL including the following:.

Surnames you are researching in McDowell County, WV

Your first and last name

Your current email address

IMPORTANT: don't forget to send us an update if you change your current email address!
